module.name: ddcprobe
module.summary: ddcprobe retrieves monitor and graphics card information

interface.name: ddcprobe_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute ddcprobe in the ddcprobe domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: ddcprobe_run
interface.summary: Execute ddcprobe in the ddcprobe domain, and allow the specified role the ddcprobe domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: Role to be authenticated for ddcprobe domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the clock domain to use.
